title: For the love of a child
creator_credit: Douglas Stanley and Nomad Films International
brief_description: Documentary film showing how birth by the natural method can be a beautiful experience in communication and togetherness for the whole family. It illustrates the need for proper mental and physical preparation.
description: Documentary film showing how birth by the natural method can be a beautiful experience in communication and togetherness for the whole family. It illustrates the need for proper mental and physical preparation.
